Question: In May 2012, an anonymous masseur filed a lawsuit against this person citing claims of sexual assault and battery.
Hints: This person performed several of the songs on the Grease soundtrack album.
In 1989, this person starred in Look Who's Talking, which grossed $297,000,000, making it his most successful film since Grease.
This person and Preston have regularly attended marriage counseling; This person has stated that therapy has helped the marriage.
